sentences.sContent: When do you do morning exercise?
He found it useful to his health to do morning exercise every day.
sentences.sContent_eng: He found it useful to his health to do morning exercise every day.
sentences.sCn: 他发现每天做早操对健康十分有益。

sentences.sContent: Thirdly, wed better do morning exercise every day, do sports frequently to make our bodies strong.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thirdly, wed better do morning exercise every day, do sports frequently to make our bodies strong.
sentences.sCn: 第三，我们最好每天做早操运动频繁，能使我们的体魄强壮。
